scripts.lint: yarn workspaces foreach -Rp -j unlimited run prettier . --write
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach -Rp -j unlimited --from '@kaito-http/*' --no-private run build
scripts.test-all: yarn workspaces foreach -Rp -j unlimited --from '@kaito-http/*' --no-private run test
scripts.attw: yarn workspaces foreach -Rp -j unlimited --from '@kaito-http/*' --no-private run attw
scripts.release: yarn constraints --fix && yarn build && yarn publish-all
scripts.publish-all: yarn workspaces foreach -R --from '@kaito-http/*' --no-private npm publish --access public
